title: Terrifying moment a family is forced from their car and kidnapped by a armed gunmen
text:
A family-of-eight was forced out of their vehicles at gunpoint on Monday and held captive in east-central Mexico before they were released several hours later.

A CCTV camera mounted to a building off a road in the east-central state of Puebla caught the moment a gun-totting gang ambushed the two vehicles that were transporting cattle.

The kidnappers drew their weapons at the passengers in the first vehicle and forced them into the getaway truck.

An armed man can be seen stopping the fist family car and pointing his gun at the passengers in the front seat

The family, which was travelling in the two vehicles, were held at gunpoint and moved into a getaway car

The surveillance camera showed the driver of the second family car ramming it in reverse before the suspects rushed the vehicle with their guns.

The assailants subsequently shoved two women and a child into their escape truck.

One of the purported attackers then dove off in the second vehicle with the livestock.

The victims were freed by their captors Monday afternoon and reported the incident to law enforcement officials.

There have been 60 reported kidnappings in Puebla since January, according to government data.
description: A family-of-eight was forced out of their vehicles at gunpoint on Monday and held captive in east-central Mexico before they were released several hours later.
